summary.span: 此类包含用于进行 XSD 验证的 LINQ to XML 扩展方法。

span.span: This class contains the LINQ to XML extension methods for XSD validation.

summary.span: 获取已验证节点的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

span.span: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证后, 可以检索文档中包含的或的架构验证后信息集。After you have validated an , you can retrieve the post-schema-validation infoset for an or that is contained in the document. 检索对象后, 可以使用或属性获取部分验证类型 (或)。After retrieving the object, you can use the or properties to get a partial validation type ( or ). 您可以使用部分验证类型来验证属性或子树。You can use the partial validation types to validate an attribute or a sub-tree.

summary.span: 获取已验证特性的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

span.span: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated attribute.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含 的架构验证后信息集。

span.span: A that contains the post-schema-validation infoset for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法返回的来确定已验证特性的某些特性。You can use the returned by this method to determine certain characteristics of a validated attribute. 例如, 可以确定属性是否来自 XSD 中的默认属性值。For example, you can determine if the attribute came from a default attribute value in an XSD. 使用属性可获取部分验证类型 ()。You use the property to get a partial validation type (). 你可以使用它来重新验证属性, 而无需验证整个文档。You can use it to revalidate an attribute without validating an entire document. 有关此属性的示例, 请参见。For an example of this property, see .

param.name: source
param.span: 一个之前已经验证过的 。

span.span: An that has been previously validated.

summary.span: 获取已验证元素的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

span.span: Gets the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) of a validated element.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含 的架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。

span.span: A that contains the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法返回的来确定已验证元素的某些特征。You can use the returned by this method to determine certain characteristics of a validated element. 例如, 您可以确定元素的动态架构类型。For example, you can determine the dynamic schema type of the element. 使用属性可获取部分验证类型 ()。You use the property to get a partial validation type (). 你可以使用它来重新验证子树 (其中包含元素, 而无需验证整个文档)。You can use it to revalidate a sub-tree with an element at its root without validating an entire document. 有关此属性的示例, 请参见。For an example of this property, see . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 PSVI 填充树。The following example populates the tree with a PSVI. 验证后, 它会根据 PSVI 打印树中无效的所有元素和属性。After validation, it prints all elements and attributes in the tree that are invalid according to the PSVI. ```csharp static void DumpInvalidNodes(XElement el) { if (el.GetSchemaInfo().Validity != XmlSchemaValidity.Valid) Console.WriteLine("Invalid Element {0}", el.AncestorsAndSelf() .InDocumentOrder() .Aggregate("", (s, i) => s + "/" + i.Name.ToString())); foreach (XAttribute att in el.Attributes()) if (att.GetSchemaInfo().Validity != XmlSchemaValidity.Valid) Console.WriteLine("Invalid Attribute {0}", att .Parent .AncestorsAndSelf() .InDocumentOrder() .Aggregate("", (s, i) => s + "/" + i.Name.ToString()) + "/@" + att.Name.ToString() ); foreach (XElement child in el.Elements()) DumpInvalidNodes(child); } static void Main(string[] args) { string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", new XElement("GrandChild1", "AAA"), new XElement("GrandChild2", "ZZZ"), new XElement("GrandChild3", "ZZZ") ) ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ..."); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root); } ``` ```vb Private Sub DumpInvalidNodes(ByVal el As XElement) If el.GetSchemaInfo.Validity <> XmlSchemaValidity.Valid Then Console.WriteLine("Invalid Element {0}", _ el _ .AncestorsAndSelf _ .InDocumentOrder() _ .Aggregate("", _ Function(ByVal s, ByVal i) s + "/" + i.Name.ToString())) End If For Each att As XAttribute In el.Attributes() If att.GetSchemaInfo.Validity <> XmlSchemaValidity.Valid Then Console.WriteLine("Invalid Attribute {0}", _ att _ .Parent _ .AncestorsAndSelf() _ .InDocumentOrder() _ .Aggregate("", _ Function(ByVal s, ByVal i) s + "/" + i.Name.ToString()) + _ "/@" + att.Name.ToString()) End If Next For Each child As XElement In el.Elements() DumpInvalidNodes(child) Next End Sub Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = _ AAA ZZZ ZZZ Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ...") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 ... The 'GrandChild2' element is invalid - The value 'ZZZ' is invalid according to its datatype 'GCType' - The Enumeration constraint failed. The 'GrandChild3' element is invalid - The value 'ZZZ' is invalid according to its datatype 'GCType' - The Enumeration constraint failed. doc1 did not validate Invalid Element /Root Invalid Element /Root/Child1 Invalid Element /Root/Child1/GrandChild2 Invalid Element /Root/Child1/GrandChild3 ```

summary.span: 验证 、 或 是否与 中的 XSD 相符。

span.span: Validates that an , an , or an conforms to an XSD in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法使用基础根据 XSD 验证 XML 树。These methods use an underlying to validate the XML tree against an XSD. 使用委托处理验证错误和警告消息。Validation error and warning messages are handled using the delegate. 如果未向这些方法提供事件处理程序, 则验证错误将作为公开。If no event handler is provided to these methods, validation errors are exposed as an . 验证警告不会导致引发。Validation warnings do not cause an to be thrown. 其中一些扩展方法可以选择允许填充架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。Some of these extension methods optionally allow population of the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).

summary.span: 此方法验证 是否与 中的 XSD 相符。

span.span: This method validates that an conforms to an XSD in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此扩展方法验证是否符合中的架构内容模型。This extension method validates that the conforms to the schema content model in . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，然后针对架构集验证两个 对象。The following example creates an , then validates two objects against the schema set. 其中一个文档为有效文档，而另一个则不是。One of the documents is valid, the other is not. ```csharp string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "content1"), new XElement("Child2", "content1") ) ); XDocument doc2 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "content1"), new XElement("Child3", "content1") ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1"); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (o, e) => { Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message); errors = true; }); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc2"); errors = false; doc2.Validate(schemas, (o, e) => { Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message); errors = true; }); Console.WriteLine("doc2 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); ``` ```vb Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = _ content1 content2 Dim doc2 As XDocument = _ content1 content1 Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating doc2") errors = False doc2.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors) Console.WriteLine("doc2 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 doc1 validated Validating doc2 The element 'Root' has invalid child element 'Child3'. List of possible elements expected: 'Child2'. doc2 did not validate ```

exception.span: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

span.span: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.

summary.span: 此方法验证 是否与指定的 和 相符。

span.span: This method validates that an conforms to a specified and an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法验证是否符合架构。You can use this method to validate that an conforms to a schema. 当你修改了某个特性, 并且想要确保它仍符合其架构时, 通常使用此方法。You typically use this method when you have modified an attribute, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema. 您可以验证整个文档, 但需要较少的处理时间来验证该属性。You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate just the attribute. 如果传递`null` for `validationEventHandler`, 此方法会在验证错误时引发异常。If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, this method raises an exception upon validation errors. 验证警告不会引发异常。Validation warnings will not raise an exception. 若要验证属性, 请使用的实例。To validate an attribute, you use an instance of . 可以通过多种方式获取此实例。You can obtain this instance in various ways. 简单的方法如下所示:An easy way is as follows: 1. 验证文档是否符合架构。Validate that a document conforms to a schema. 2. 通过调用扩展方法添加架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the extension method. 3. 调用扩展方法以检索实现的对象。 Call the extension method to retrieve an object that implements . 从检索的对象中, 可以获取。From the retrieved object, you can get an . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . 具有的实例后, 可以使用此方法来验证特性。After you have an instance of an , you can use this method to validate an attribute. ## Examples ```csharp string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Lang", "C#") ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ..."); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ..."); XAttribute lang = doc1.Root.Attribute("Lang"); errors = false; lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }); Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); // the following makes the Lang attribute invalid according to the schema lang.Value = "VC"; Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ..."); errors = false; lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }); Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); ``` ```vb Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ...") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ...") Dim lang As XAttribute = doc1.Root.Attribute("Lang") errors = False lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors) Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) ' the following makes the Lang attribute invalid according to the schema lang.Value = "VC" Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ...") errors = False lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors) Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 ... doc1 validated Validating Lang attribute ... lang validated Validating Lang attribute ... The 'Lang' attribute is invalid - The value 'VC' is invalid according to its datatype 'Token' - The Enumeration constraint failed. lang did not validate ```

exception.span: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

span.span: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Validate (this System.Xml.Linq.XDocument source, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler validationEventHandler, bool addSchemaInfo);

.method public static hidebysig void Validate(class System.Xml.Linq.XDocument source, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, class System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler validationEventHandler, bool addSchemaInfo) cil managed

summary.span: 验证 是否与 中的某个 XSD 相符，并且可以选择使用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。

span.span: Validates that an conforms to an XSD in an , optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此扩展方法验证是否符合中的架构内容模型。This extension method validates that the conforms to the schema content model in . 如果`addSchemaInfo` 为`true`, 则此方法将用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, this method populates the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI). 可以通过两个步骤, 用 PSVI 填充 XML 树。There are two steps to populating the XML tree with the PSVI. 1. 首先, 将批注添加到树中的所有节点, 以便对树中的元素或属性调用或。First, an annotation is added to all nodes in the tree to enable you to call or on an element or attribute in the tree. 2. 其次, 将 XSD 中定义的默认元素和属性添加到 XML 树中。Second, default elements and attributes defined in the XSD are added to the XML tree. 通过调用其中一种方法, 您可以确定是否已从 XSD 作为默认元素或属性添加了特定的元素或属性。By calling one of the methods, you can determine if a specific element or attribute was added from the XSD as a default element or attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例包含一个 XSD, 用于定义`Child2` `Att1`具有默认值的属性的元素。The following example contains an XSD that defines the `Child2` element with an `Att1` attribute with a default value. 成功验证文档后, 具有默认值的属性将添加到 XML 树中。After successfully validating the document, the attribute with the default value is added to the XML tree. 请注意, 不会将默认属性添加`doc2`到, 后者不会根据架构进行验证。Note that the default attribute is not added to `doc2`, which does not validate against the schema. ```csharp string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "c1"), new XElement("Child2", "c2") ) ); XDocument doc2 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "content1"), new XElement("Child3", "content1") ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1"); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (o, e) => { Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc2"); errors = false; doc2.Validate(schemas, (o, e) => { Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc2 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc1:"); Console.WriteLine(doc1); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc2:"); Console.WriteLine(doc2); ``` ```vb Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = c1 c2 Dim doc2 As XDocument = content1 content1 Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating doc2") errors = False doc2.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc2 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc1:") Console.WriteLine(doc1) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc2:") Console.WriteLine(doc2) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 doc1 validated Validating doc2 The element 'Root' has invalid child element 'Child3'. List of possible elements expected: 'Child2'. doc2 did not validate Contents of doc1: c1 c2 Contents of doc2: content1 content1 ``` 下面的示例用 PSVI 填充树。The following example populates the tree with PSVI. 验证后, 它会根据 PSVI 打印树中无效的所有元素和属性。After validation, it prints all elements and attributes in the tree that are invalid according to the PSVI. ```csharp static void DumpInvalidNodes(XElement el) { if (el.GetSchemaInfo().Validity != XmlSchemaValidity.Valid) Console.WriteLine("Invalid Element {0}", el.AncestorsAndSelf() .InDocumentOrder() .Aggregate("", (s, i) => s + "/" + i.Name.ToString())); foreach (XAttribute att in el.Attributes()) if (att.GetSchemaInfo().Validity != XmlSchemaValidity.Valid) Console.WriteLine("Invalid Attribute {0}", att .Parent .AncestorsAndSelf() .InDocumentOrder() .Aggregate("", (s, i) => s + "/" + i.Name.ToString()) + "/@" + att.Name.ToString() ); foreach (XElement child in el.Elements()) DumpInvalidNodes(child); } static void Main(string[] args) { string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", new XElement("GrandChild1", "AAA"), new XElement("GrandChild2", "ZZZ"), new XElement("GrandChild3", "ZZZ") ) ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ..."); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root); } ``` ```vb Private Sub DumpInvalidNodes(ByVal el As XElement) If el.GetSchemaInfo.Validity <> XmlSchemaValidity.Valid Then Console.WriteLine("Invalid Element {0}", _ el _ .AncestorsAndSelf _ .InDocumentOrder() _ .Aggregate("", _ Function(ByVal s, ByVal i) s + "/" + i.Name.ToString())) End If For Each att As XAttribute In el.Attributes() If att.GetSchemaInfo.Validity <> XmlSchemaValidity.Valid Then Console.WriteLine("Invalid Attribute {0}", _ att _ .Parent _ .AncestorsAndSelf() _ .InDocumentOrder() _ .Aggregate("", _ Function(ByVal s, ByVal i) s + "/" + i.Name.ToString()) + _ "/@" + att.Name.ToString()) End If Next For Each child As XElement In el.Elements() DumpInvalidNodes(child) Next End Sub Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = _ AAA ZZZ ZZZ Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ...") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 ... The 'GrandChild2' element is invalid - The value 'ZZZ' is invalid according to its datatype 'GCType' - The Enumeration constraint failed. The 'GrandChild3' element is invalid - The value 'ZZZ' is invalid according to its datatype 'GCType' - The Enumeration constraint failed. doc1 did not validate Invalid Element /Root Invalid Element /Root/Child1 Invalid Element /Root/Child1/GrandChild2 Invalid Element /Root/Child1/GrandChild3 ```

.method public static hidebysig void Validate(class System.Xml.Linq.XElement source, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject partialValidationType, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, class System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler validationEventHandler) cil managed
static member Validate : System.Xml.Linq.XElement * System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject * System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet * System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: 要验证的 。

span.span: The to validate.

param.name: partialValidationType
param.span: 一个 ，指定要验证的子树。

span.span: An that specifies the sub-tree to validate.

param.name: schemas
param.span: 一个作为验证依据的 。

span.span: An to validate against.

param.name: validationEventHandler

summary.span: 此方法验证 子树是否与指定的 和 相符。

span.span: This method validates that an sub-tree conforms to a specified and an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法验证子树 ( 在其根路径下) 是否符合架构。You can use this method to validate that a sub-tree (with an at its root) conforms to a schema. 在修改了子树后, 通常会使用此方法, 并且想要确保它仍符合其架构。You typically use this method when you have modified a sub-tree, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema. 您可以验证整个文档, 但需要较少的处理时间来验证只是一个子树。You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate a just a sub-tree. 如果将传递`null`给`validationEventHandler`, 则此方法会在验证错误时引发异常。If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors. 验证警告不会引发异常。Validation warnings will not raise an exception. 若要验证子树, 请使用的实例。To validate a sub-tree, you use an instance of . 可以通过多种方式获取此实例。You can obtain this instance in various ways. 简单的方法如下所示:An easy way is as follows: 1. 验证文档是否符合架构。Validate that a document conforms to a schema. 2. 通过调用扩展方法添加架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the extension method. 3. 调用扩展方法以检索实现的对象。 Call the extension method to retrieve an object that implements . 从检索的对象中, 可以获取。From the retrieved object, you can get an . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . 具有的实例后, 可以使用此方法验证子树。After you have an instance of an , you can use this method to validate an sub-tree. ## Examples ```csharp string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", new XElement("GrandChild1", "gc"), new XElement("GrandChild2", "gc") ) ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ..."); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating Child1 after first edit ..."); XElement child1 = doc1.Element("Root").Element("Child1"); child1.Add(new XElement("GrandChild2", "gc")); errors = false; child1.Validate(child1.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaElement, schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }); Console.WriteLine("child1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); // the following makes the Child1 element invalid according to the schema child1.Add(new XElement("GrandChild3", "gc")); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating Child1 after second edit ..."); child1.Validate(child1.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaElement, schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }); Console.WriteLine("child1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); ``` ```vb Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = _ gc gc Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ...") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating Child1 after first edit ...") Dim child1 As XElement = doc1.Element("Root").Element("Child1") child1.Add(gc) errors = False child1.Validate(child1.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaElement, schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors) Console.WriteLine("child1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) ' the following makes the Child1 element invalid according to the schema child1.Add(gc) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating Child1 after second edit ...") child1.Validate(child1.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaElement, schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors) Console.WriteLine("child1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 ... doc1 validated Validating Child1 after first edit ... child1 validated Validating Child1 after second edit ... The element 'Child1' has invalid child element 'GrandChild3'. child1 did not validate ```

summary.span: 验证 是否与指定的 和 相符，并且可以选择使用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。

span.span: Validates that an conforms to a specified and an , optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法验证是否符合架构。You can use this method to validate that an conforms to a schema. 当你修改了某个特性, 并且想要确保它仍符合其架构时, 通常使用此方法。You typically use this method when you have modified an attribute, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema. 您可以验证整个文档, 但需要较少的处理时间来验证该属性。You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate just the attribute. 如果`addSchemaInfo` 为`true`, 则此方法将用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充属性。If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, this method populates the attribute with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI). 使用 PSVI 填充 XML 树后, 可以对已验证的特性调用 。After you have populated the XML tree with the PSVI, you can call on the validated attribute. 如果你编写的代码依赖于返回的数据, 则这会很有用。This is useful if you are writing code that relies on data returned by . 如果将传递`null`给`validationEventHandler`, 则此方法会在验证错误时引发异常。If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors. 验证警告不会引发异常。Validation warnings will not raise an exception. 若要验证属性, 请使用的实例。To validate an attribute, you use an instance of . 可以通过多种方式获取此实例。You can obtain this instance in various ways. 简单的方法如下所示:An easy way is as follows: 1. 验证文档是否符合架构。Validate that a document conforms to a schema. 2. 通过调用扩展方法添加架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the extension method. 3. 调用扩展方法以检索实现的对象。 Call the extension method to retrieve an object that implements . 从检索的对象中, 可以获取。From the retrieved object, you can get an . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . 具有的实例后, 可以使用此方法来验证特性。After you have an instance of an , you can use this method to validate an attribute. ## Examples ```csharp static void DumpInvalidNodes(XElement el) { if (el.GetSchemaInfo().Validity != XmlSchemaValidity.Valid) Console.WriteLine("Invalid Element {0}", el.AncestorsAndSelf() .InDocumentOrder() .Aggregate("", (s, i) => s + "/" + i.Name.ToString())); foreach (XAttribute att in el.Attributes()) if (att.GetSchemaInfo().Validity != XmlSchemaValidity.Valid) Console.WriteLine("Invalid Attribute {0}", att .Parent .AncestorsAndSelf() .InDocumentOrder() .Aggregate("", (s, i) => s + "/" + i.Name.ToString()) + "/@" + att.Name.ToString() ); foreach (XElement child in el.Elements()) DumpInvalidNodes(child); } static void Main(string[] args) { string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Lang", "C#") ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ..."); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ..."); XAttribute lang = doc1.Element("Root").Attribute("Lang"); errors = false; lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root); // the following makes the Lang attribute invalid according to the schema lang.Value = "VC"; Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ..."); errors = false; lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine(e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root); } ``` ```vb Private Sub DumpInvalidNodes(ByVal el As XElement) If el.GetSchemaInfo.Validity <> XmlSchemaValidity.Valid Then Console.WriteLine("Invalid Element {0}", _ el _ .AncestorsAndSelf _ .InDocumentOrder() _ .Aggregate("", _ Function(ByVal s, ByVal i) s + "/" + i.Name.ToString())) End If For Each att As XAttribute In el.Attributes() If att.GetSchemaInfo.Validity <> XmlSchemaValidity.Valid Then Console.WriteLine("Invalid Attribute {0}", _ att _ .Parent _ .AncestorsAndSelf() _ .InDocumentOrder() _ .Aggregate("", _ Function(ByVal s, ByVal i) s + "/" + i.Name.ToString()) + _ "/@" + att.Name.ToString()) End If Next For Each child As XElement In el.Elements() DumpInvalidNodes(child) Next End Sub Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1 ...") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ...") Dim lang As XAttribute = doc1.Element("Root").Attribute("Lang") errors = False lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root) ' the following makes the Lang attribute invalid according to the schema lang.Value = "VC" Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating Lang attribute ...") errors = False lang.Validate(lang.GetSchemaInfo().SchemaAttribute, schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("lang {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) DumpInvalidNodes(doc1.Root) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 ... doc1 validated Validating Lang attribute ... lang validated Validating Lang attribute ... The 'Lang' attribute is invalid - The value 'VC' is invalid according to its datatype 'Token' - The Enumeration constraint failed. lang did not validate Invalid Attribute /Root/@Lang ```

.method public static hidebysig void Validate(class System.Xml.Linq.XElement source, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject partialValidationType, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, class System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler validationEventHandler, bool addSchemaInfo) cil managed

summary.span: 验证 子树是否与指定的 和 相符，并且可以选择使用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。

span.span: Validates that an sub-tree conforms to a specified and an , optionally populating the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法验证子树 ( 在子树的根目录下) 是否符合架构。You can use this method to validate that a sub-tree (with an at the root of the sub-tree) conforms to a schema. 在修改了子树后, 通常会使用此方法, 并且想要确保它仍符合其架构。You typically use this method when you have modified a sub-tree, and you want to make sure that it still conforms to its schema. 您可以验证整个文档, 但需要较少的处理时间来验证只是一个子树。You could validate the entire document, but it takes less processing time to validate a just a sub-tree. 如果`addSchemaInfo` 为`true`, 则此方法将用架构验证后信息集 (PSVI) 填充 XML 树。If `addSchemaInfo` is `true`, then this method populates the XML tree with the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI). 用 PSVI 填充 XML 树有两个方面。There are two aspects of populating the XML tree with the PSVI. 首先, 将批注添加到树中的所有节点, 以便现在可以对树中的元素或属性调用。First, an annotation is added to all nodes in the tree such that you can now call on an element or attribute in the tree. 其次, 将 XSD 中定义的默认元素和属性添加到 XML 树中。Second, default elements and attributes defined in the XSD are added to the XML tree. 通过调用其中一种方法, 您可以确定是否已从 XSD 作为默认元素或属性添加了特定的元素或属性。By calling one of the methods, you can determine if a specific element or attribute was added from the XSD as a default element or attribute. 如果将传递`null`给`validationEventHandler`, 则此方法会在验证错误时引发异常。If you pass `null` for `validationEventHandler`, then this method raises an exception upon validation errors. 验证警告不会引发异常。Validation warnings will not raise an exception. 若要验证子树, 请使用的实例。To validate a sub-tree, you use an instance of . 可以通过多种方式获取此实例。You can obtain this instance in various ways. 简单的方法如下所示:An easy way is as follows: 1. 验证文档是否符合架构。Validate that a document conforms to a schema. 2. 通过调用扩展方法添加架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)。Add the post-schema-validation infoset (PSVI) by calling the extension method. 3. 调用扩展方法以检索实现的对象。 Call the extension method to retrieve an object that implements . 从检索的对象中, 可以获取。From the retrieved object, you can get an . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . - 如果获取 的, 则类型将为。 If you get an for an , the type will be . 具有的实例后, 可以使用此方法验证子树。After you have an instance of an , you can use this method to validate a sub-tree.. ## Examples ```csharp string xsdMarkup = @" "; XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet(); schemas.Add("", XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xsdMarkup))); XDocument doc1 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "c1"), new XElement("Child2", "c2") ) ); XDocument doc2 = new XDocument( new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", "content1"), new XElement("Child3", "content1") ) ); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1"); bool errors = false; doc1.Validate(schemas, (o, e) => { Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Validating doc2"); errors = false; doc2.Validate(schemas, (o, e) => { Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message); errors = true; }, true); Console.WriteLine("doc2 {0}", errors ? "did not validate" : "validated"); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc1:"); Console.WriteLine(doc1); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc2:"); Console.WriteLine(doc2); ``` ```vb Dim errors As Boolean = False Private Sub XSDErrors(ByVal o As Object, ByVal e As ValidationEventArgs) Console.WriteLine("{0}", e.Message) errors = True End Sub Sub Main() Dim xsdMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim schemas As XmlSchemaSet = New XmlSchemaSet() schemas.Add("", xsdMarkup.CreateReader) Dim doc1 As XDocument = _ c1 c2 Dim doc2 As XDocument = _ content1 content1 Console.WriteLine("Validating doc1") errors = False doc1.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc1 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Validating doc2") errors = False doc2.Validate(schemas, AddressOf XSDErrors, True) Console.WriteLine("doc2 {0}", IIf(errors, "did not validate", "validated")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc1:") Console.WriteLine(doc1) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Contents of doc2:") Console.WriteLine(doc2) End Sub ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Validating doc1 doc1 validated Validating doc2 The element 'Root' has invalid child element 'Child3'. List of possible elements expected: 'Child2'. doc2 did not validate Contents of doc1: c1 c2 Contents of doc2: content1 content1 ```

exception.span: 出现 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 验证错误时引发。

span.span: Thrown for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) validation errors.
